scripts.build: pnpm clean-tsbuildinfo && pnpm --filter accented build && pnpm --filter accented typecheckTests && pnpm --filter devapp typecheck && pnpm --filter accented checkBuiltFiles && pnpm --filter accented checkImportsInBuiltFiles
scripts.dev: pnpm clean-tsbuildinfo && (pnpm --filter accented watch & pnpm --filter devapp dev)
scripts.website:dev: pnpm clean-tsbuildinfo && (pnpm --filter accented build & pnpm --filter website dev)
scripts.changeset-version: pnpm changeset version && pnpm biome format --write
